name: Ideamarket
description: If Bitcoin is "money without banks," Ideamarket is "credibility without media corporations." We want the world’s best information to reach the public in weeks instead of years. The live site is a court of public opinion — delegated proof-of-stake (DPoS) for information verification. Instead of media corporations deciding what's true, it's trusted users "elected" by other users via staked $IMO. Ideamarket enables prediction markets based on public opinion, which blows open the doors on what prediction markets are able to address. - I bet $100 that [Epstein didn't kill himself] will be rated above [50] on [Jan 1, 2023] - I bet $100 that [UFOs are piloted by aliens] will be rated above [50] on [Jan 1, 2023] - etc This is already possible today. If it works, there's no longer a gatekeeper when it comes to spreading information credibly.
